job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Work with industry experts in combining the best of deep learning and semiconductor design, to bring on-edge machine learning to listening devices.
This will improve efficiency and improving privacy, whilst lowering latency and saving bandwidth. Moving away from inference and training that is dependent on cloud or legacy data-centers, this company uses unique technology to accelerate toward processing on device.
As the first, implementation is on devices with listening capabilities, the company is looking for a strong engineer with the ability to implement speech and audio algorithms in high quality, seamless code.
If you’re a passionate innovative engineer, excited about the future of deep learning then this is for you.
To be considered, you'll need;
Ph.D. in a relevant technical field
5 years as a strong technical contributor in speech and/or audio processing
A strong list of patents and publications
Experience with DSP implementation and optimization of speech and audio algorithms
Experience with acoustic testing of speech and audio algorithms/devices
Experience with; machine learning, deep learning, audio processing, speech processing, speech recognition, multi-microphone spatial processing, acoustics echo cancellation, single-channel noise suppression, acoustic testing, source separation, single-channel noise suppression, dereverberation
Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.
